mapper.select: SELECT c.member_id, c.member_nick, c.comment_content, c.create_dtm FROM S_gyulbbe.comment c JOIN S_gyulbbe.board b ON b.board_seq = c.board_seq WHERE c.board_seq = #{boardSeq} ORDER BY c.comment_seq DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO S_gyulbbe.comment (board_type_seq, board_seq, comment_content, create_dtm, member_id, member_nick) VALUES(2, #{boardSeq}, #{commentContent}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{memberId}, #{memberNick})
